DOC.brief_summary: To compare SBDECT standard Triple Phase Multi-Detector CT ( TPMDCT ) renal mass evaluation term appropriateness treatment receive diagnosis . To determine SBDECT diagnostic accuracy .
DOC.brief_title: Dual Energy CT v Standard Triple Phase CT-A Randomised Control Trial
DOC.criteria: Patients suspect renal mass need evaluation contrast enhance CT scan Patients refer CT Urography Patients willing participate study Age < 18 yr Pregnant females Patients previous h/o serious allergic reaction Contrast allergy Impaired renal function ( estimate GFR < 45mL/min/mm2 ) Sonographically proven benign renal mass need evaluation
